entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:52 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 02:00 AM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -3.0°C
Wind: S 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain or freezing rain beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 6:06 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers or drizzle. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Rain showers with periods of freezing rain early in the morning and with drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:06 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 6:06 PM EST Monday 16 January 2023
